evilTreeofKnowledge.name: Evil Tree of Knowledge
evilTreeofKnowledge.onGuardedMessage:
{Evil Tree of Knowledge}

When you approach the Tree of Knowledge, it opens its eyes, and then its eyes become fierce. You know that the tree seems to have been cursed and has become violent. Do you want to challenge it?

rewards.message:
{Evil Tree of Knowledge}

With the evil spirit that was parasitic in the trunk destroyed, the tree regained its sanity. When you approached, the tree opened its eyes excitedly and said, Aha, explorer, please let me pass on the knowledge I have accumulated over the years to you.
